instruction: Create a three line song about the following topic.
output:
Verse 1
The flowers start to bloom again,
Each petal gently swaying,
A new start for us can begin.

Chorus
It’s a new season of joy and delight,
Celebrating all of life’s new light,
The time has come for spring!

Verse 2
The snow is melting away,
The sun is shining bright,
Even in trying times, we are okay.
